page.title: 10SCORTON FEAST
page.content: The children's teas was in the institute because the weather was so bad.It is normally on the village green.It starts at 4 o'clock.A lot of people take their children there.After the teas the children were given 50p and an ice cream. After the teas they hold sports for the children.Some of the races were running races,a backwards race,a three legged race and some races for the younger children. The fancy dress was held on Wednesday at 6 o'clock on Scorton Green.There was a children's competition and some entries from Scorton hospital.One person came as Super Gran,and others came as a domino,a bride, a Japanese doll a carrot and Roland Rat.
